Title: Relates to authorizing the assessor of the city of Long Beach to accept from New Beth El, Inc. an application for exemption from real property taxes
Summary: Authorizes the assessor of the city of Long Beach, county of Nassau, to accept from New Beth El, Inc. an application for exemption from real property taxes during the 2019-2020 assessment roll.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the assessor of the city of Long Beach, county of Nassau, to accept from New Beth El, Inc. an application for exemption from real property taxes
